flawed_nl_solution:
She will keep 1000000 / 2 = <<1000000/2=500000>>500000 Safe Moon tokens for herself.
For the remaining siblings, they will each receive 500000 / 4 = <<500000/4=125000>>125000 tokens.
This means that Sandy will have 500000 - 125000 = <<500000-125000=370500>>370500 tokens more than any of her siblings.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 375000.0, not 370500.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
